data.title: Orthopedics
meta_keywords: Alfred I. duPont Hospital for Children
data.meta_description: Learn more about Nemours' advanced, world-renowned pediatric orthopedic surgeons and pediatric orthopedic expertise.
data.text:
Assistive Technology

The assistive technology team identifies devices to help children with challenges eat, move and do other daily tasks.

Cardiology

Learn more about Nemours Children's Health pediatric cardiologists and the expert care they provide for children with all types of heart conditions.

Gait & Motion Analysis

Helps us diagnose abnormal gait (walking problems) in children.

Genetics

Experts who diagnose and treat genetic disorders in children.

Hand Therapy Program

Nemours Children’s Health hand therapists are occupational and physical therapists who specialize in the rehabilitation of hand, wrist, elbow and shoulder conditions and injuries.

Neurology

Get access to 20+ of the best pediatric neurologists who care for children with nearly every neurologic condition or brain injury.

Neurosurgery

Nemours is nationally recognized for pediatric neurosurgery. Find expert neurosurgeons prepared to treat your condition in Florida and Delaware Valley.

Occupational Therapy

Nemours Children's Health pediatric occupational therapy provides evaluation and treatment for children who have difficulty performing everyday activities.

Oncology

Nemours pediatric oncology experts provide leading treatment and support options for kids with cancer.

Orthopedics

Learn more about Nemours' advanced, world-renowned pediatric orthopedic surgeons and pediatric orthopedic expertise.

Orthotics

Find kid-friendly orthotics care at Nemours – from fitting and refitting the ideal orthotic to helping children thrive as they grow.

Osteogenesis Imperfecta Program, Delaware Valley

The Nemours Children’s Health Osteogenesis Imperfecta Program (“OI Program”) includes internationally recognized experts dedicated to helping children with brittle bone disease.

Pain Management

At Nemours Children's Health, we provide pain management care that treats the whole child, physically and emotionally — and the whole family.

Pediatric Intensive Care

Nemours Children's Health critical care experts treat critically ill children in our pediatric intensive care unit (PICU), 24 hours a day, 7 days week.

Physical Therapy

Nemours pediatric physical therapy experts work to decrease pain, improve movement, and help kids manage daily activities.

Prosthetics

Our board-certified pediatric orthopedists use the latest technology to fit prosthetics based on age and stage and provide thorough ongoing follow-up care.

Pulmonology

Nemours Children's Health pediatric pulmonologists (lung and respiratory care doctors) treat children with diseases of the lungs and airways.

Radiology (Medical Imaging)

Nemours Children's Health pediatric radiology teams use noninvasive tests and equipment designed or adapted for pediatric use to "see" kids' bones, organs and tissues.

Rehabilitation Medicine

We offer comprehensive inpatient and outpatient rehabilitation programs for children who have severe limitations from an illness or injury.

Skeletal Dysplasia Program, Delaware Valley

Nemours Children’s Health offers one of the top skeletal dysplasia programs in the world for diagnosing and treating skeletal dysplasias in children (such as primordial dwarfism).

Sports Medicine

Nemours pediatric sports medicine experts diagnose, treat and help prevent injuries in kids and teens.
